title: Departmental Courses Platform
description: A comprehensive course management system for university departments, enabling students to browse, enroll, and track their academic progress.

title: Inventory Manager
description: Store is a web application meant to automate inventory of stores ie (dukas ,stores) for sale management and fund insights.

title: Tab Saver
description: A simple browser tab-saving tool that allows users to save and manage links locally. Designed for users who want to bookmark tabs quickly without relying on browser bookmarks..

title: Finance Manager
description: Comprehensive money management with expenditure and income management insights.
